languages.text: "Император не посылает тяжелейшие испытания тем, кто не в силах их пройти. Порой самый тернистый путь оказывается самым праведным".
"The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
languages.original_text: "Император не посылает тяжелейшие испытания тем, кто не в силах их пройти. Порой самый тернистый путь оказывается самым праведным".

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
"The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
"The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
"The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
"The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
"The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."

languages.text: «El Emperador no plantearía dificultades tan rigurosas a alguien que no pudiera superarlas. En ocasiones, el camino más espinoso es también el más justo».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador no plantearía dificultades tan rigurosas a alguien que no pudiera superarlas. En ocasiones, el camino más espinoso es también el más justo».

languages.text: 「皇帝は、その気のない者に厳しい挑戦状を叩きつけることはない。何より過酷な道が、何より正しい道であることもある」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝は、その気のない者に厳しい挑戦状を叩きつけることはない。何より過酷な道が、何より正しい道であることもある」

languages.text: “帝皇绝不会让无法胜任的人接受严酷的挑战。有的时候，最为荆棘丛生的道路，也同样是最为正义的道路。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇绝不会让无法胜任的人接受严酷的挑战。有的时候，最为荆棘丛生的道路，也同样是最为正义的道路。”

languages.text: "Der Imperator würde eine derart gnadenlose Herausforderung niemals jemandem zumuten, der ihr nicht gewachsen ist. Manchmal ist der dornigste Pfad auch der rechtschaffenste."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator würde eine derart gnadenlose Herausforderung niemals jemandem zumuten, der ihr nicht gewachsen ist. Manchmal ist der dornigste Pfad auch der rechtschaffenste."

languages.text: « L'Empereur ne vous soumettrait pas à un défi aussi éprouvant si vous n'étiez pas à la hauteur. Parfois, la voie la plus épineuse est aussi la plus juste. »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur ne vous soumettrait pas à un défi aussi éprouvant si vous n'étiez pas à la hauteur. Parfois, la voie la plus épineuse est aussi la plus juste. »

languages.text: "İmparator, baş edemeyecek birisini böylesine eziyetli bir zorlukla sınamaz. Bazen en çetrefilli yol, aynı zamanda en erdemli olandır."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor would not send a gruelling challenge to one who was not up to it. Sometimes the thorniest path is also the most righteous one."
